definition: to correct/to rectify (e.g. a physical defect such as hearing or vision)/to cure/rectification/correction/to straighten
to correct/to rectify/to redress/strong/brave/to pretend/to feign/affectation
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
see 牙齒矯正器|牙齿矫正器[ya2 chi3 jiao3 zheng4 qi4]

sentences.english: In the first section are the improvement measures to the legislation of community-based correction.
sentences.chinese: 第一節，我國社區矯正類型的立法完善。

sentences.english: Setup a matrix for pixel-correct rendering.
sentences.chinese: 設置一個矩陣用於像素矯正渲染。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of surgical treatment for concomitant esotropia of children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手術矯正小兒共同性內斜視的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a new method for correcting square face deformity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討矯正方臉畸形的一種新術式。

sentences.english: To wear corrective lenses when driving.
sentences.chinese: 駕駛時須戴矯正視力的眼鏡。

sentences.english: Both can be treated with braces.
sentences.chinese: 兩者皆可以用牙套矯正。

sentences.english: First, the correct formation of polyps in the bile, prevents the growth of polyps and re-generated.
sentences.chinese: 矯正形成息肉膽汁，阻止息肉的生長與再生成。

sentences.english: Removable PU foam insole may help accommodate a personal orthotic.
sentences.chinese: 可拆卸的聚氨酯泡沫鞋墊可以幫助容納個人的矯正。

sentences.english: Complex fractures, though—those that involve bones shattered into fragments—are more challenging.
sentences.chinese: 可使若骨折的骨片錯綜複雜則很難矯正。

sentences.english: US officials said they would, "press vigorously for redress".
sentences.chinese: 美國官員說他們會“使勁壓以達到矯正的效果”。

sentences.english: For us it hinders self-realization and merits corrective surgery.
sentences.chinese: 對我們來說這隱含了自我實現和矯正手術的優點。

sentences.english: There are three significant design concepts in this duty-cycle corrector.
sentences.chinese: 新型的工作週期矯正器具有三個關鍵的設計觀念。

sentences.english: Nexus - information on refractive and cataract surgery, corneal topography and topographers.
sentences.chinese: 屈光矯正，白內障手術，角膜地形圖的有關信息。

sentences.english: And these lenses do not correct serious astigmatism.
sentences.chinese: 而且這種眼鏡也無法矯正嚴重的散光。

sentences.english: Orthotics are usually custom-made using a plaster model of your foot.
sentences.chinese: 矯正鞋墊通常用石膏模型量足定做。

sentences.english: He took lessons, and had to wear a hip brace for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他上了芭蕾課，還戴了一年的矯正器。

definition: (of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to complement/to make up for a deficiency
to adjust/to regulate/to harmonize/to reconcile (accountancy etc)
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
